result.name: western-channel-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
One survey(s) of Western Channel rMCZ site have been completed to date (Apr 
2015): Cruise: Cefas_cend0312 Date: 20th February - 27th February 2012 Data 
collected: MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 100% Coverage (CHP) and 
(Cefas_cend0312) MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): 100% Coverage (CHP) and 
(Cefas_cend0312) SS Coverage: None acquired to date Video and Stills Samples 
to date: 38 video transects; 250 stills analysed (560 stills taken) - Usable 
PSA Samples to date: 57 Infauna Samples to date: 57

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
